A discourse about tradition shewing what is meant by it, and what tradition is to be received, and what tradition is to be rejected. Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.
54, [2] p.
Printed by Miles Flesher for Robert Horne ..., London : 1683.
Advertisement: p. [1]-[2] at end. Attributed to Simon Patrick, Bishop of Ely. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
